channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen™ Master
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen™ Master

item.title: CVE-2023-20560|2023-08-15T21:08:47.904Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%20master
item.description: Insufficient validation of the IOCTL (Input Output Control) input buffer in AMD Ryzen™ Master may allow a privileged attacker to provide a null value potentially resulting in a Windows crash leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-20564|2023-08-15T21:07:49.838Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%20master
item.description: Insufficient validation in the IOCTL (Input Output Control) input buffer in AMD Ryzen™ Master may permit a privileged attacker to perform memory reads/writes potentially leading to a loss of confidentiality or arbitrary kernel execution.
